article:
This is a 'list of churches in the [[Anglican Diocese of Sydney]]'. This
includes physical church buildings even if they do not currently have
congregations meeting. If a congregation meets in a shared space such as a
school hall, it should only be listed if it is the primary meeting site
for a parish.
